title: Does Riot save reports, despite no Tribunal?
body:
Does Riot save the reports coming in through the report system in-game despite there being no Tribunal?

I would think they do, but I'm not sure.

replies.body: yeah they do. they still ban people, albeit slowly, so the reports still help.

That's good to know, we (my fiance and I) have been seeing more and more toxic people around. Especially the last 2 weeks, where 2 players (playing a Yasuo and an Annie) have been taking the cake with that.
